meta.name: description
meta.content: AgileWiki will make you look at that science of building Web Applications in a different way. Built upon the principles of rolonic theory, AgileWiki takes Web Application Development to the next level. Scaling is built in and applications built upon the AgileWiki Framework are immediately suited to life in The Cloud.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: web application framework, web applications, web application development, the cloud, Scala, Jetty, noSQL, Comet
